document_data.caption: A map showing the Trollyard and surroundings in the Field Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: The Trollyard
document_data.mainbody: The '''Trollyard''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Trollyard was located in the west section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Field Ward|Field Ward]]. It was situated between the [[Trolltower]] and the [[Troll Gate]]. The [[Fieldway]] entered the eastern side of the Trollyard.
